snippet: Bob and Mike Bryan kept the United States alive in its Davis Cup first-round tie against Britain, holding off a comeback by Jamie Murray and Dominic Inglot to win Saturday’s doubles in five sets in Glasgow.
abstract: Americans Bob and Mike Bryan defeat Jamie Murray and Dominic Inglot of Britain in Davis Cup doubles match; other Davis Cup matches noted.
lead_paragraph: Bob and Mike Bryan kept the United States alive in its Davis Cup first-round tie against Britain, holding off a comeback by Jamie Murray and Dominic Inglot to win Saturday’s doubles in five sets in Glasgow.

headline.main: Bob and Mike Bryan Hang On for U.S. in Davis Cup
